text: Google Maps on my iPhone has been giving bad driving directions around Kingston, NY. Sending me on a five mile loop to go somewhere that's less than 1/2 mile away. This is new behavior. I wonder if it is related to my blog not supporting HTTPS. (That was a joke, but it could happen. Their search index for my blog gets worse all the time. And I believe that is punishment for not obeying their edict.)
